# Mo_E18_5_MesCells Samples

We did scRNAseq (10X version 3) of mouse endochondral bones cell populations (in a balanced/even representation way, by FACS isolation) in perinatal stages E18 (just before birth) and postnatal day 1 (PN1).

## About input files

The files used as input for this analysis are the files coming out of the the
*cellranger count* pipeline.

In this case I used cellranger v6.0.0.



```{r packages}
library(Matrix)
library(dplyr)
library(Seurat)
library(patchwork)
library(ggplot2)
library(DoubletFinder)
library(BiocStyle)
library(dittoSeq)
library(RColorBrewer)
```

```{r}

ggplotColours <- function(n = 6, h = c(0, 360) + 15){
  if ((diff(h) %% 360) < 1) h[2] <- h[2] - 360/n
  hcl(h = (seq(h[1], h[2], length = n)), c = 100, l = 65)
}

```

## Load pre-processed data

```{r Load precomputed data}
Mo_E18_5_MesCells <-  readRDS("../../2-QC/Mo_E18_5_MesCells.rds")
dim(Mo_E18_5_MesCells)
```

## Manual Annotation of the clusters

I will annotate the clusters following the annotation made by Gretel.
Most of the cell types agree with the clusters found at resolution "0.3" but there
are 2 subclusters that I will manually annotate based on marker genes.

```{r}
DimPlot(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, label = T, group.by = "RNA_snn_res.0.3" )
```

## Subdivide some clusters

```{r}
Mo_E18_5_MesCells <- FindSubCluster(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, cluster = 7,resolution = 0.2, graph.name = "RNA_snn", subcluster.name = "CLP_NK_Tcells")
DimPlot(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, label = T, group.by ="CLP_NK_Tcells" )
```

```{r}
Mo_E18_5_MesCells <- FindSubCluster(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, cluster = 0,resolution = 0.75, graph.name = "RNA_snn", subcluster.name ="Tenocytes")
DimPlot(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, label = T, group.by ="Tenocytes",
        cells = which(Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 0))
```



```{r}
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type <- NA
# C0=PaS/ Endosteal Fibroblasts (0, 176, 240)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 0] <- "PaS/EndostealFibroblasts"
# Neutrophils 1 (1, 203,0)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[which(Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 1)] <- "Neutrophils1"
# Monocytes (213, 252,121)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 2] <- "Monocytes"
# Neutrophils 2 (16, 152, 85)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 3] <- "Neutrophils2"
# CAR (255, 126, 72)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 4] <- "CAR"
#C5= Osteoclasts (174, 205, 100)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 5] <- "Osteoclasts"
#C6= Chondrogenic Lineage (1, 134, 227)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 6] <- "Chondrogenic"
#C7=HPC (hematopoietic progenitor cells) (62, 243, 180)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 7] <- "HPC"
#C8= B cell lineage (101, 203, 176)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 8] <- "B_cell"
#C9=OCP (0, 145, 147)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 == 9] <- "OCP"
#C10= Eo/Bas (122, 129, 255)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==10] <- "Eo/Bas"
#C11= Proliferating Fibroblasts Progenitors (PFP) (121, 249, 255)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==11] <- "PFP"
#C12 = Proliferating Hematopoietic Progenitors (PHP) (3, 50, 255)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==12] <- "PHP"
#C13= Myofibroblasts (255, 47, 146)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==13] <- "Myofibroblasts"
#C14= Erythroid cells (205, 31, 113)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==14] <- "Erythroid"
#C15= EC (endothelial cells) (255, 191, 0)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==15] <- "Endothelial"
#C16= Osteogenic lineage (110, 68, 244)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==16] <- "Osteogenic"
#C17=Schwann cells(244, 56, 234)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$RNA_snn_res.0.3 ==17] <- "Schwann"
# C18= Tenogenic lineage (254, 138, 216)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Tenocytes == "0_6"] <- "Tenogenic"
# C19= CLP NK&Tcell (191,144, 0)
Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type[Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$CLP_NK_Tcells == "7_1"] <-"CLP_NK_Tcells"



mylevels <- c("PaS/EndostealFibroblasts","Neutrophils1","Monocytes","Neutrophils2",
              "CAR","Osteoclasts","Chondrogenic","HPC","B_cell","OCP","Eo/Bas","PFP",
              "PHP","Myofibroblasts","Erythroid","Endothelial","Osteogenic","Schwann",
              "Tenogenic","CLP_NK_Tcells","NA")

Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type <- factor(Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type, levels = mylevels)
#levels(Mo_E18_5_MesCells@meta.data$Cell_Type) <- mylevels
```


```{r}
col_palette <- c( rgb(0, 176/255, 240/255),       # C0=PaS/ Endosteal Fibroblasts (0, 176, 240)
                  rgb(1/255, 203/255,0),          # Neutrophils 1 (1, 203,0)
                  rgb(213/255, 252/255, 121/255), # Monocytes (213, 252,121)
                  rgb(16/255, 152/255, 85/255),   # Neutrophils2 (16, 152, 85)
                  rgb(255/255, 126/255, 72/255),  # CAR (255, 126, 72)
                  rgb(174/255, 205/255, 100/255), # Osteoclasts (174, 205, 100)
                  rgb(1/255, 134/255, 227/255),   # Chondrogenic Lineage (1, 134, 227)
                  rgb(62/255, 243/255, 180/255),  #C7=HPC (hematopoietic progenitor cells) (62, 243, 180)
                  rgb(101/255, 203/255, 176/255), #C8= B cell lineage (101, 203, 176)
                  rgb(0, 145/255, 147/255),       #C9=OCP (0, 145, 147)
                  rgb(122/255, 129/255, 255/255), #C10= Eo/Bas (122, 129, 255)
                  rgb(121/255, 249/255, 255/255), #C11= Proliferating Fibroblasts Progenitors (PFP) (121, 249, 255)
                  rgb(3/255, 50/255, 255/255),    #C12 = Proliferating Hematopoietic Progenitors (PHP) (3, 50, 255)
                  rgb(255/255, 47/255, 146/255),  #C13= Myofibroblasts (255, 47, 146)
                  rgb(205/255, 31/255, 113/255),  #C14= Erythroid cells (205, 31, 113)
                  rgb(255/255, 191/255, 0/255),   #C15= EC (endothelial cells) (255, 191, 0)
                  rgb(110/255, 68/255, 244/255),  #C16= Osteogenic lineage (110, 68, 244)
                  rgb(244/255, 56/255, 234/255),  #C17=Schwann cells(244, 56, 234)
                  rgb(254/255, 138/255, 216/255), #C18= Tenogenic lineage (254, 138, 216)
                  rgb(191/255,144/255, 0),        #C19= CLP NK&Tcell (191,144, 0)
                  "gray")

DimPlot(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, group.by = "Cell_Type", label = T, cols = col_palette, repel = T )
```

```{r, eval=FALSE}
saveRDS(Mo_E18_5_MesCells, "Mo_E18_5_MesCells_Annotated.rds")
```
